name: Atheya and Invicta Learning
description:
INVICTA is a learning facilitation company encompassing experts in training, development and HR consulting and delivering high quality programs. We aim to facilitate companies in the complex task of discovering and maintaining the competitive edge through designing and delivering the highest standard of training and consulting. 
 We believe in investing time in understanding your training and development needs and customize high-end modules which are practical, relevant, inspiring and alleviating positive change. We work together with corporate companies as a smart partner in providing hands-on solutions to help solve day to day business challenges by developing their human capital, all with the help and guidance of our multifaceted organization. As a firm we act as an extended arm and will cater to your learning needs from identifying them to making sure that they have been implemented to better performance of your employees .We are believer in learning that inspires.
features: Customizing learning to the individual and the organization
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Learning is Continuous and with that Progression is evident!
ShortDescription: INVICTA is a learning facilitation company encompassing experts in training, development and HR consulting and delivering high quality programs.
key_use_cases: Facilitating companies in discovering and maintaining competitive edge through training and consulting
Designing and delivering customized, high-standard training and consulting programs tailored to organizational and individual needs
Providing hands-on solutions to solve day-to-day business challenges through human capital development
Identifying and catering to specific learning needs within an organization
Implementing learning programs to improve employee performance
Executing learning projects to facilitate the implementation of new techniques
competitive_advantages: Expertise in training, development, and HR consulting
Customization of high-end learning modules to be practical, relevant, inspiring, and change-alleviating
Commitment to understanding specific training and development needs
Provision of hands-on solutions acting as a 'smart partner' and 'extended arm'
Delivery of learning projects specifically for technique implementation
implementation_scenarios: Consultative approach acting as an 'extended arm' for learning needs, from identification to implementation
hr_functions_supported: Performance Management (indirectly, through improving employee performance)
roi_benefits: Discovery and maintenance of competitive edge
Positive change within the organization through inspiring learning
primary_users: Business Leaders (seeking human capital development and competitive advantage)
